options.name: Rune of Destruction
options.description: Multiple Wounds (D3).

options.name: Rune of Smashing
options.description: Attacks allocated towards a model with Res 5 or more have their Str set to 10 and AP set to 10.

options.name: Rune of Penetration
options.description: +3 AP.

options.name: Rune of Might
options.description: +1 Str and +1 AP.

options.name: Rune of Precision
options.description: +1 to hit.

options.name: Rune of Craftsmanship
options.description: The weapon follows the rules for Great Weapon instead of the original weapon's rules. This does not prevent the weapon from being engraved with additional Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Quickening
options.description: +3 Agi.

options.name: Rune of Anger
options.description: +1 Att.

options.name: Rune of Lightning
options.description: Grind Attack (D3, Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks). A model with two or more instances of this enchantment increases the number of hits to 2D3. Note that these hits are not affected by the effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Returning
options.description: Can be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 8", Shots 1, Str , AP , Quick to Fire,Accurate,Reload!The effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments apply to Shooting Attacks made with this weapon (even if the effects are normally restricted to Melee Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Fire
options.description: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, may gain Flaming Attacks until the end of the phase.

options.name: Rune of Resistance
options.description: Resistance.

options.name: Rune of Steel
options.description: Must reroll failed Armour Save rolls.

options.name: Rune of Retribution
options.description: When rolling a successful Aegis Save from Shield Wall, the model inflicts a hit with the same Str and AP as the attack that was saved onto the Health Pool of the model that caused the wound. This occurs before any casualties are removed. These hits do not benefit from Weapon Rules or Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Iron
options.description: +1 Arm.

options.name: Rune of the Forge
options.description: Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Denial
options.description: One use only. The player may choose to use this Runic Artefact instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is automatically dispelled.

options.name: Rune of Devouring
options.description: One use only. The player may choose to use this Runic Artefact instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is cast as normal but the Caster may not cast it again for the rest of the game.

options.name: Rune of Harnessing
options.description: In the opponent's Magic Phase, after rolling for Excess Magic, remove one Magic Dice from the opponent's pool.

options.name: Rune of the Courage
options.description: One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. For the duration of the phase, the bearer gains Stubborn.

options.name: Rune of Dragon's Breath
options.description: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Grounding
options.description:
One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. All spells with Duration: One Turn that affect any of the following units come to an end:
  • The bearer's unit;
  • Enemy units in contact with the bearer's unit.

options.name: Rune of Readiness
options.description: One use only. May be activated at the end of the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved. If the bearer's unit was successfully Charged during this phase, it may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

options.name: Rune of Storms
options.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of the opponent's Player Turn. Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of the bearer. Until the end of the Player Turn, Cha and Mob of all models with Fly in that unit are halved, rounding fractions up.

options.name: Rune of Shielding
options.description: Aegis (+1, max. 4+). The Aegis from this Runic Artefact can only stack with itself and Shield Wall.

options.name: Rune of Mastery
options.description: One use only. A single Rune of Mastery may be activated immediately before the bearer attempts to cast a Bound Spell. The Casting Roll for this Bound Spell gains +1.

options.name: Rune of Mining
options.description: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Terrain Feature on the Battlefield. As long as the bearer is on the Battlefield, all friendly models may treat this Terrain Feature as Open Terrain when making a Move Maneuvre (Reform, Advance or March Move), but must still follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of their move.

options.name: Rune of Kinship
options.description: The bearer gains Ambush (Board Edge), Scout, Vanguard.

options.name: Runic Standard of Shielding
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks).

options.name: Runic Standard of Swiftness
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Vanguard.

options.name: Runic Standard of Dismay
options.description: Charge Range rolls against the bearer's unit are Minimised.

options.name: Runic Standard of Steadiness
options.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Movement Phase. The bearer's unit loses Unwieldy until the end of the Player Turn.

options.name: Runic Standard of the Anvil
options.description: Failed Charge Range rolls by other friendly units must be rerolled when directed against enemy units already Engaged in Combat with the bearer's unit.

options.name: Runic Standard of Wisdom
options.description: Select a single Battle Rune and note which one on the Army List. This Battle Rune can be cast by the bearer as a Bound Spell. It can only target the bearer's own unit.

options.name: Runic Standard of the Hold
options.description: A unit with one or more Runic Standard of the Hold are considered to have one additional Proper Rank for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes.

options.name: Rune Crafted (+1 to hit towards Fly)
